snippet.title: Monkey GO Happy Marathon 3
snippet.description: Monkey GO Happy Marathon 3 Puzzle game. Try to solve all the puzzles in each stage to make sure the monkey smiles.

snippet.title: Moron Marathon
snippet.description: Moron Marathon Run as fast as possible by alternating the left and right key, try to stop in the red.

snippet.title: Mental Training: Visual Challenge
snippet.description: Mental Training: Visual Challenge Stimulate your brains by playing 4 diffrent mini games. Prove your mental powers!

snippet.title: Dino Run: Marathon of Doom
snippet.description: Dino Run: Marathon of Doom Action game. Survive for as long as you can running away from mayhem.

snippet.title: Monkey GO Happy Marathon
snippet.description: Monkey GO Happy Marathon Try to complete the mini games as fast as you can to make the monkey happy.

snippet.title: Monkey GO Happy Marathon 2
snippet.description: Monkey GO Happy Marathon 2 Your goal is to make the monkey smile by solving the problem of each puzzle.

snippet.title: Mecha Arena
snippet.description: Mecha Arena RPG game. Make the mecha you own the stringest one around and win all battles with it.
